text: Wall-to-wall surveillance set-up. Two FBI AGENTS: DONALD CARRUTHERS 30's and RICHARD MESSNER 30's, man the post, staring at video monitors. Both hold telephoto images; sh long lens shots of a mansion some distance away. Messner tacks photographs to a corkboard on the van wall. One is labeled "Subject SIDNEY K. SERNA: UNDERBOSS/Sparazza Fami The other is labeled "Subject VICTOR "BABY BUZZ" PADICHE LIEUTENANT/Sparazza Family." Voices begin emitting over t van's speakers.
Buzzy...Buzz...?
Yeah...Sid?
You got clicks, anything?
Nah, nuthin' on my end--
--Okay...hang on, I gotta move--
Messner rides a digital console, tweaks frequency.
(keying mic) Zoom and pan please.   Stay tight.
ON THE MONITORS: The image pans, follows a figure moving behind the mansion's windows, entering a back bedroom.
Alright, now Buzzy-- this is, this is it, here, okay, so listen to me careful and wait till I'm finished 'cuz we got no room for slop.
I'm here.
Messner adjusts the record level, V-U meters spike, modul The figure on the monitors paces the room. WE SEE it's Se
Okay, he's gonna clip Israel, I just gotta outta there--
--he's doing it then, huh--
--yeah, now lemme finish, I was eavesdroppin', so give me sec, lay this thing out, since the information might be a little loose--
--okay, g'head--

So what I heard downstairs there is that they got a guy, some Swede, real badass, supposedly a "specialist" and they're bringing him over. Now he ain't coming cheap-- so, I'm thinkin' we jump, do this in the next day or so, get to Israel before the Swede can, we got chits, y'see? We're in a power position. Grab him, ransom him back, pick up that nut, we're that much closer to having our own thing.
--I see that, yeah, s'smart move, for us anyway.

Trust me, we keep our mouths shut, go about our thing, play the part, nobody suspects us. (feedback distorts) The old man's on the fade Buzzy, fuck him, y'know? And that hurts, I don't like saying that, but hey, our livelihood, our lifeboat, y'get?
No question, no, you're right. We gotta do what's good for us now.
Fuckin' A, first survive, yes?
Y'gotta, y'gotta. But d'ya think they'll kick ransom for that little prick, assuming we get to'm.
Yeah, y'ain't heard the punchline, yet and before I get to it, one more thing I heard, little curious, should probably bring it up...Primo wants Israel's heart. The actual thing, the organ.
Pause. Feedback. The agents trade looks. Carruthers grabs a cellphone, dials, patches a feed for the party on the o end to hear.
...Jesus...what for?
--who can say. He's off his onion, y'know, he's old school Sicilian, this is how they hate.
Wow.

Hey, we nab Israel, they pay t'get'm back, I'll cut the fuckin' thing out m'self, no extra charge. My thing is, we crew up, let's not fuck around, someone's cousin, some Zip off the boat from Naples, let's get pros, people who know how to behave.
Yeah, there's a pair'a broads I'm thinking might be good for this.
Chances are, they're gonna get into some shit too, hafta put people down.
That's not a problem. Are we goin' outta pocket ourselves?
Yeah, I can front this.
Well just so I got a quote in my head. What's the rate for the Swede?
That's the punchline, y'ready?
Shoot.
A million flat.
No shit.
None whatsoever.
The Ace of Hearts, spinning through mid-air, slow motion, end over end. Bullets blast big sizzling holes through it

Neon-framed doors fly open as a slicked-back chump with a store-bought tan strides out onto the strip, swinging und bar-bait on each arm. He's all strut and punk swagger, grinning like a geek who just struck gold.

Buddy Israel, nicknamed "Aces" Born a bastard, mom Laverne chased the pipe dream from a Dairy Queen in Kansas City to the Vegas stage. Two months after stepping off a Greyhound, she gets knocked up by some hood.

A row of chorus girls, gilded like gold-flaked flamingos, rubbing coca-butter on bare midriffs. THE CAMERA FINDS Buddy's mother LAVERNE, prominent bulge, seriously pregna she's arguing with her employers, trying to suck in her b yelling "bullshit, you just have to light it right..."
Biological abandons her and the showgirl thing goes sideways so she winds up working as a magician's assistant to make extra cash.
Second rate dive bar. Laverne Israel assists a pompadour- maned MAGICIAN on stage. In the lounge, sitting on a stripper's lap, a young Buddy plays with a deck of cards.

Bamboo-style ceiling fans circulate cigar smoke and shitt attitudes. At a billiard table in the back: JACK DUPREE, 40's, third generation Bail Bondsman, talks with HOLLIS ELMORE, 30's and "PISTOL" PETE DEEKS, 30's, ex-Vegas vice cops. As Dupree speaks, WE SEE the scenes behind the stor
...And young Buddy learns everything about cards from this Mandrake motherfucker his mom is working for...
The magician being brutally beaten-- pelted with poker ch kicked in the chops, pissed on, the works.
But magic man was also a degenerate gambler and got caught dealing bottom- deck at a mob-owned poker parlor. (beat) He didn't get outta there with much more than a pulse.
The Magician, full body cast, taking his meals through a straw. Young Israel labors over him, performing card tric

Point is, he passed on all this slight of hand shit onto Aces and the kid is sick with it...By the age of twelve Buddy Israel is positively prodigal with a deck of cards. By sixteen, he's headlining the MGM's main room.
Buddy, cards and coins dancing off his fingertips, dazzli sold-out crowds. Laverne Israel sits in the front row, de out in ankle-length fur, applauding wildly.
Dupree rounds the table, lines up a shot, leans over it.
This punk is pulling down ten bills a night and more showgirl geech than you can shake a stick at. Four years of sold-out shows, he becomes the unofficial mob mascot

Buddy meets mob hierarchy; silk suits and pinkie rings. DUPREE (cont'd; V.O.) (CONT'D) By the tender age of twenty-one he's breaking bread with the wheels, keeping company with major muscle. And it goes to his head in a big way
Buddy, poolside, glass of top dollar Dom in hand. Chicks, Coopertone and chasm-deep cleavage abound.

...Wiseguys start to think this sonofabitch is a mystic, something special...and Aces plays it up, lets the legend grow, takes time off from his stage act and starts showcasing the chip on his shoulder.
Buddy, tipping a craps table, attacking the stick-man, stripping off one of his gold chains, going garotte.
He buys into his bullshit, building street cred, he's got plans and pull, he's makin' plays, living the mob life for real. Somehow, it takes: Lounge act turned legitimate thug.
Dupree rips the eight ball, corner pocket.

In reality, he doesn't know the ball from the bounce...He's not a crook, so he starts fucking up fast and picking up speed, putting a floodlight on the whole Carlotta organization. Cops get curious, start camping out, compiling names and faces and pretty soon Israel's bullshit has brought the heat to bear on none other than Primo Sparraza--
--Enforcer.    Extortionist.   Killer.

WE RECOGNIZE Carruthers and Messner as the two Agents fro the Padiche/Serna surveillance. They are sitting with F.B Deputy Director STANLEY LOCKE. A debrief is in progress. SUPER: WASHINGTON, D.C. A Mafia Family Tree has been erected behind them with a p of Primo Sparazza at the top.

Sparazza is rumored to have performed in excess of one-hundred and thirty contract murders, including one of the bureau's most celebrated agents. Freeman Heller. You heard of "The Turnpike Murders" that was Sparazza.
I thought Heller was a double op?
FREEMAN HELLER, 20's, clean cut Cornell grad, class of 19 He's on a pistol range, scoring perfect marks.
No. He worked for the O.S.S. before joining the Bureau in its heyday. He was the first operative assigned with infiltrating the mob.
Heller, outdistancing the rest of his recruiting class in training run, nearly a mile ahead of the next man.
Full immersion and assimilation, fake identity, falsified background, everything that is now standard operating procedure, Heller implemented, way back when.
Heller oversees every aspect of his transformation, radic altering his appearance, adding different mannerisms, an accent, etc...befuddled FBI brass can only look on in awe

And as a result, his undercover work was wildly successful. He eventually reached the rank of Capo inside the Carlotta crime family...but through some internal slip-up, his cover was compromised and Primo Sparazza was given the contract to kill him.

A '51 Ford Fairlane, flush with an embankment, bullet perforated, dead-body draped. A top-coated gunman (presum Primo Sparazza) stalks the vehicle's sole survivor, FREEM HELLER; faux mafioso, full-time federal agent.
There wasn't enough evidence to bring formal charges, so the case never went to trial.
Heller collapses, the gunman looms over, levels a .45, FI
Sparazza is a bit of a specter. Over the years, the serious crimes with which he was thought to be involved, including Heller's murder, could never be traced back to him.
The gunman slinks back to his car as we--
Locke stands, distributes files.
A dedicated viciousness and a slavish devotion to mob doctrine had Sparazza's star on the rise. So the mob relocated him to Nevada and he became the unofficial head of the Las Vegas LCN.
A PHOTOGRAPH of PRIMO SPARRAZA, sharkskin suit, vintage 6 coif, posing in front of The Riviera with a dour, pissed- Frank Sinatra.
So he's personally issued the contract on Israel?
Sparazza was the one who introduced Israel to the life, gave him his first big break, brought him through the ranks.
Made him a friend of the family.
Sparazza and Israel, Casino grand opening, flashbulbs bur
...His hand-picked protege, successor to the throne...and Israel played the situation very shrewd.
A MONTAGE OF more photo-pos, Buddy Israel posing with mob power brokers, playmakers...smiling all the way to the to
...Slowly amassing the loyalties of Sparazza's top men...with plans of toppling the throne.
Buddy, late-night conspiratorial confab with Sparazza sol

In doing so, he plunged the Carlotta organization into a civil war, splitting the family into dual factions. Sparazza on one side, Israel on the other. The infighting that followed drew the interest of nearly every major investigative body operating under the canopy of the federal government.

Stakeout teams snap photos- plant bugs- wire hidden camer LOCKE (cont'd; V.O.) Presently there are sixteen state and federally funded agencies, running concurrent criminal probes on select members of the LCN...With Israel
LOCKE (cont'd; V.O.) (CONT'D) being the primary target in virtually every investigation.
Israel sits with a group of FBI agents, discusses a deal.
A marked man gets wise and wants to come in.

His testimony has the potential of blowing the lid off what's left of the La Cosa Nostra is this country. That alone warrants total immunity from prosecution and and a vanishing act with Witness Protection.
Israel is walked out of the room as we CUT BACK TO:
So the wiretaps we conducted on Serna and Padiche, the mention of Israel's heart?

--Your intel corroborates what we already know. Sparazza's health is in rapid decline and before his date with destiny, it seems he wants one last thing...The heart of his sworn enemy. A recently opened, cash rich escrow account has been traced back to Sparazza. This and the mention of this mysterious Swede makes the million dollar contract on Israel very real.
How real...?

Greasy spoon soul food joint, packed lunch counter. Meet SHARICE WATTERS, 33 and GEORGIA SYKES, 24, Ebony stunners ghetto queens, street assassins. They are sitting with th booking contact, LORENZO WYMAN, 41. He holds up a copy of bank telex, sliding it across the table.
How 'bout six-figures for this fool? How 'bout that love?
Watters takes the telex, gawks, shows the numbers to Syke
Bulllllshit...

Naw baby, they heard about that Triad hit, the work ya'll put in and they recognize the skills. And this ain't no tryout, tap-dance "show us your shit" thing neither-- if ya'll want this then I'mma go git it for 'ya.
Watters twirls her long braids, looks over at Sykes.
So me and Sis here, 'cuz we got a rep on a rise, we chipped some nails on some niggas, they want us to drop this mafiaoso so and so, magician, whatever-the fuck he is.
S'way it works girl. Ya'll done dirt, ya'll peeled some serious caps. Word travels.
And so I get this straight, we gotta go in, bust on this punk and remove the heart? Is that for real?

No, no, no, y'gotta go in and get him, pull'm out of wherever he at, forget all that other shit, that's just f'flavor. I'm still getting lil' bits'a this-n-that from this cat Padiche, the man contacting me...Right now, what we got-- (nod to telex) --Is a number and a name...Buddy Israel.
(to Loretta) What else did Padiche say?
He said that the shit could get hot, could get heavy...I said good. (beat, grins) 'Cuz I got two of the hottest, heaviest bitches alive.
Like who?
The Feds continue their briefing.
Like Pasquale Acosta, blood money mercenary. His countrymen have dubbed him the more dubious "El Estrago" (beat) The Plague.
Death personified; sun-cooked skin, black hole eyes, tatt gouged out of prison boredom...This is PASQUALE ACOSTA.
American educated, fluent in over a dozen languages, did journeyman's work for CIA funded "G-2" and "Archivo" death squads in Guatemala and Chile...noted for his legendary torture techniques.

Acosta clips car battery cables to the eyelids of a dissi FLASH TO: Acosta scorching an off-camera scrotum with a blowtorch. FLASH TO: Acosta powering up a bore-drill as a semi-nude man screams and pleads.

Sought for war crimes and human rights violations in eighteen different countries. When he was caught by the SAS in Northern Ireland and imprisoned, he chewed off his fingertips to the bone before he could be printed and ID'd by Interpol.
Pasquale; prison cell filthy, feasting on his fingers.
On an extradition flight back to El Salvador, he murdered a security detachment and vanished.
You think it's possible he could be involved in the Israel hit?

Possibly. Acosta is pure mercenary. And a million dollar hit fee will draw some huge flies. But forget about Sparazza's money for a moment and remember, there's no shortage of those who want Israel killed and no shortage of cash to do just that...
...Then I'm sure you've heard of these guys...The Tremor brothers.
Dupree chalks his cue, positions for a shot.

No? (off dull stares from Deeks and Elmore) Then you've both been living under the same rock, 'cuz these cocksuckers are infamous. Three brothers, same skank mom, different deadbeat dads, used for that suicide-kamikaze style shit. You heard about that huge shoot- out in Cleveland?
Is that the club that got wiped out a couple months back?
What happened?

The Teamsters had a reform measure going to ballot that didn't sit too well with the local syndicate. Night of the polling, big black-tie to-do downtown and the Tremor Brothers crash the party. Literally.

THE TREMOR BROTHERS pilot a Dodge Barracuda right through the front window with wrecking ball bravado. Bodies scatt as the Tremors deploy from the car in full body kevlar, d doomsday on the club. One of them fires up a chainsaw, chewing into the panicked crowd. Bodyguards blast back, b bullets play like spitballs against the Tremor's body arm
Donald McGarey, the local union rep, is the mark. The Tremors go ripshit riot on the whole club, seven people dead, twenty-eight wounded. Just to get to this one guy.
Shotguns roar-- blast spreads obliterate-- a shitstorm of blood, spilled booze and busted glass--

--And they get it about as good as they give it. In the melee, one of the brothers catches blowback from a jammed piece and is temporarily blinded, the other takes bullets to the lower back and can't walk. The third gets popped in the neck and passes out. McGarey gets out of the club alive...and not much further...

The blind Tremor, walking wounded, piggybacking his broth with the bum back, dragging the other by the scruff of hi neck, unconscious across the concrete. Police sirens sque McGarey, the union guy, hairpiece hanging by a thread, crawling toward his car. The piggyback Tremor brother rea into his blind brother's coat, grabs a revolver and unloa Long live the teamsters...Not tonight.
Dupree chalks his cue.
They're speed freaks, neo-nazi's. Sworn to the swastika, supposedly read and recite "Mein Kampf" like Mother Goose...And these motherfuckers can go megaton at the drop of a hat.
What's the name again?
Wyman, Sykes and Watters, back at the greasy spoon.
"Soot, Lazlo Soot." Lotta folks want this white boy clapped. Soot could be workin' for one 'em.
Crammed pedestrian crossing, noon hour a trio of SUITS converse, shrouded by bodyguards.
Nobody really certain where he come from...

The party proceeds through the crosswalk, approaching the is a dark-suited man, expressionless, hands in his pocket Others move past; a woman with shopping bags, a skateboar punk, a geriatric dog-walker and a man, full paralysis, m op wheelchair, "My Left Foot" palsy.
...and when he moves on somebody, they the last ones t'see it comin'--

The bodyguards perk up, sensing something. Dark-Suit, removing his hands from his pockets-- cellphone...Wrong g The crippled cat, throwing a quilt off his lap, contorted face vanishing, two Uzi machine-pistols up, safeties off, triggers pulled-- BAP! BAP! BAP! BAP! BAP! BAP! The bodyguards get caught napping-- bullets blaze point b The three suits collapse. The phony invalid empties both guns, hops up from the wheelchair, hooks a passing truck flees the scene...that, was LAZLO SOOT.
So what do you think?
The boys have retired to the bar for a round of dollar dr
I think it's idiotic to continue this conversation. (turns, to Deeks) We're ex-cops which means we weren't great cops or even good ones.
Paying bills with bullshit casino jobs, sitting watch on slot machines.
Which was a great gig until we we walked in here and started drinking.
The bond on Israel expires in eighteen hours, after that, it's a jump ball. Our window is now.
Who posted his bail?
Dupree pats himself down, searching for his cigs.
His law firm, same one that hired me. Israel walked out after he made bail and nobody's seen him since.

Jack, if the rumors hold and Israel is really the great white whale of snitches, then the mob is looking to put all kinds of bullets into his ass and pour some serious psychotics into the mix to do just that. So what real incentive is there to track him on something as small-time as a skip trace, when it's putting you and yours in the path of severe pain and suffering and an almost certain prelude to doom.
A beat. Dupree blows smoke, flicks ash.
So I guess you're not going.
Shit, if you're on a crazy jag, why stop there, why not take Fort Knox with a fucking slingshot or go into Hell after Hitler...I like your chances a lot more.
Dupree, stubbing his cigarette.
I know his location, we've got the drop of a maybe half a day before that location gets grape-vined and the rest of the world gets hipped.
That's already happened hoss.   It's naive to think otherwise.
Where is he?
--Lake Tahoe.
Watters, nodding, wiping red sauce off her fingers.
Three hours t'the east. S'day trip. Pretty this time a'year too...
Sykes sets her fork down, wipes her hands on a napkin.
We gotta lay something out, strategy- wise. Somethin' tight. Y'go in there ad-libbing, it's y'ass.
What are we talkin' on the split...
Forty-five apiece for you two, ten percent finders fee for me.
What's the time frame?
Right mafuck'n now girl. Fast as we can get you there. We wait any longer, someone goin' dead this fool.
...Then we lose our witness.
The briefing continues.

We lose our case. Twenty-four hours from now, he's scheduled to meet with federal prosecutors. His agent, a man by the name of Morris Mecklen, has guaranteed us that he'll enter into protective custody once his deal is approved.

MORRIS MECKLEN, 60's, bloated, bad combover, agent to the Vegas vanguard. He sits at his desk, jawing into the phon On the wall, framed photos; Wayne Newton, Buddy Hackett, Carol Channing and a triple-chinned, near-the-end Elvis.
We've been monitoring Mecklen's calls and have learned that Israel is staying in the penthouse level of the Nomad Hotel and Casino in Lake Tahoe, Nevada under an assumed name.
Right there? In the high-roller suite?
It's the last place they'd look.

Israel's legal representation, the firm of Culpepper, Brody and Reed, which is currently the subject of a joint SEC and Treasury Department probe, were left holding the bag after he skipped bail. Over three- quarters of a million dollars on a bond that's set to expire in less than a day. Rupert Reed, one of the firm's partners, has learned of Israel's whereabouts and dispatched a local bondsman by the name of Jack Dupree to pick him up and return him to Las Vegas...that can't happen.                        (beat) We have a Gulf Stream standing by at Reagan International to transport you two to Lake Tahoe. (pause, with weight) It's very simple gentlemen. Valacchi, Fratiano, Gravano-- no former witness against the mob has been as crucial or has brought more to bear on the potential dissolution of The La Cosa Nostra, than Buddy Israel.

Over this entire sequence WE HEAR Agent Locke speaking: The cylinder of a .44 Magnum is popped, a speed-load drop in, spun and snapped shut-- Porn mags and crossword puzzl compendiums are tossed into a carry-on. Morphine and adrenaline syringes get spiked and capped-- A collection wigs, fake sideburns and moustaches get laid out, separat
...But understand that if an attempt is made on his life...
Kevlar body armor gets stowed-- An elephant gun gets buff to a high shine-- Vintage Ww11 German Potato-Masher hand- grenades are lovingly wrapped in terry cloth towels.
...then it is being made by those of the strictest professional caliber...
Torture-tools; curved cutting implements, serrated bone s skull keys, a portable blowtorch, blackened with burned blood...all packed neatly into a duffel bag--
...They are cold-blooded, ruthless, and without restraint...and they must not succeed.
A gun is aimed, a trigger pulled..."BOOM"

Daybreak. Sunlight streams in, soft suffusion, the color good scotch. PRIMO SPARAZZA, 86, lies on a hospital bed, O2 mask shrouding deep-set, sunken eyes, cataract-grey, g out at a four-walled world. Someone enters the room, awai approval to approach...Sparazza, turning, seeing the man, summoning him over with a feeble finger wag. The man reac him, kneeling down, ring-kissing reverent, whispering:
...he's here now...

Sparazza nods. The man exits. After a moment, the door op again...and another MAN enters, walking slowly toward Sparazza's bedside. He sets down his luggage, a black lea valise. The travel tags originate in Stockholm: The Swede has arrived.
Soaring across the pristine deep blue waters of Lake Taho Rising, revealing the gaudy, mirrored glass tower of the NOMAD HOTEL & CASINO. We slowly DISSOLVE TO:

BUDDY ISRAEL, bathrobe, boxers, bags under his eyes. He absently shuffles cards, pulling aces as if by touch, telepathy. He gazes out at the snow-packed peaks. Behind him; post-bacchanalia...the ugly morning after. Prostitut passed out cold in a tangle of crotchless panties and sti heels, lying amongst smashed vodka bottles and ashtrays, coke-covered tabletops and tipped room service trays. - Israel, sober now...contemptuous of it all. He starts wal around them the way you would casualties on a battlefield His bathrobe brushes over, terrycloth catching one of the hooker's wigs, tugging it free. Israel looks down, zoomin in on her scalp, sees dandruff and scars, gags disgust an disdain. He steps, the wigs pulls. He stops and slips the bathrobe off, letting it fall rather than pull her wig th rest of the way off and ruin what illusion remains. He shuffles, begins dropping Aces on their bodies like de enemy soldiers. One of his bodyguards enters; a bulging, slow-witted, ex-bodybuilder by the name of HUGO CROOP.
D'you talk to'm?
(fetching Mylanta from the fridge) I got his machine.
A beat. Israel fidgets, twitches, rubs coke residue from nose and over his gumline
What'd you say?
(gulping Mylanta) I said I got his machine.
No, what did you say on the machine?
I left him a message.
I know you left him a message. What did you say!
Hugo looks up, seems confused. Moments pass. Israel, the patience of a gorilla, crammed into a canary cage.
Jesus Hugo!
How is it that you can turn a simple conversation into a fucking hedge maze!? This is zero degree of difficulty man!
Okay.
Then why are you still looking at me like I'm asking for the square root of something! What did you say!?
Hugo, still unsure, speaks in spite of it.
I said that we were returning his call and you were real concerned, because he sounded real concerned.
Look at that, we didn't have to fill up the whole blackboard after all. Now, do you know anything about that?
Israel wrist-flicks a playing card, it embeds a sofa cush like a ninja throwing star, right next to a beige coat.
About what?
Look at the collar on that coat...
Hugo, wary, walking over, inspecting the coat from a dist
What's that look like, that stain?
Hugo edges closer, looks down at the coat, squints.
I dunno...Cinnamon roll?

Cinnamon roll? No, good guess though. No, Hugo that looks like jizz... (reshuffles, stares) And I'm no forensic expert mind you, but that looks like some fuckhead shot their load on a twelve-thousand dollar calf's skin jacket. The twist? It's My twelve thousand dollar, calf's skin jacket. (beat, then) So y'got semen, human ejaculate--

(checks watch) --that's been allowed to soak in for what, six, seven hours now? Work it's way into the fabric-fuck'n fibers-- and while you may never see it in a Tide commercial, I think it still safely qualifies as a "tough, deep down stain."
Hugo takes another pull off the Mylanta bottle, moving sl like most morons do, avoiding eye contact at all cost.
I could have it sent out...

...to what? Incinerate? 'Cuz I'm almost dead certain there's not a fucking laundry detergent or dry cleaning process known to man that can ever return that jacket to its former glory! Some shit, suffice it to say, just don't wash out. (beat, cooling down) Now, the money question...To whom does that stain belong?
Hugo, gameface falling apart...Israel prods him.

C'mon, somebody was banging one of these skanks, sans rubber-- (beat, assesses girls) -which is terrifying in its own right- pulled out, let 'er rip and ruined the last gift my mother gave me before she died. (snatching up coat) The way I see it, it's the same as if she was dug up, three months dead and it was shot right on her rotting corpse, 'cuz that's how it defiled this feels!
Hugo. Long pause.   Big dumb blush.
Do you want me to say I did it?
I was kinda hoping, yeah.
Do you want me to say I'm sorry?
Only if you really, truly mean it.
Hugo, swallowing, pressures on. The phone begins to ring.
...I'm sorry...
Are you a fucking colossal idiot?
I am.   Yeah.
Without peer?
I-- uh, yeah, I guess, yeah.
Cards dance, Israel's hands moves at lightspeed, he reach into Hugo's shirt front and pulls a playing card out...Jo
(showing him the card) No. Be sure. Be resolute.    You stand alone on that summit.
The phone rings. Hugo, wobbly, what-to-do...? Buddy fires all fifty-two cards into his face. The beast barely blink
Get the phone, it might be Gill, then get out of my sight.
Hugo, furtive look to the floor, all those scattered card then, back to the boss, "should I?"
No. The cards can stay there. Get The Goddamn Phone.
A cellphone being lifted, revealing Special Agent Carruth
Yes Sir. Go ahead. (listens, checks watch) We're three miles from The Nomad now. We'll be awaiting word.
He clicks off. Messner occupies the passenger seat, revie surveillance tape, portable headphones on, mini-DAT playe in his lap. He listens to the following excerpt:
--so, I'm thinkin' we jump, do this in the next day or so, get to Israel before the Swede can--
Messner pulls the headphones off.
Anything on the Swede?
Only the mention made in that phone call. There's no Swedish hitman of any renown, much less one with a million dollar day rate.
Maybe he's that good. Never been caught, no criminal record.
Maybe.

Messner, sets the gear on the floorboard, stretches. He turns over photographs of Victor Padiche and Sidney Serna (the same ones that were tacked to the corkboard of the surveillance van in the opening)
I tell you, engineering this kind of play against Sparazza, going to the lengths these guys are going to...they're playing some long odds.
And a very bad gamble.
(re; the passing neon) Well... This is as good a place for it as any I guess.
A slot machine handle gets yanked, rolls, stops, lemon-le cherry- loser...please deposit coins.

Tahoe's "First and Finest" all seasons Buffet. THE CAMERA FINDS: A slicker older cat in a Guyabera shirt, mid-fifti spotted skin, sun damaged, pocked with pre-cancerous blac We recognize him from the mugshots and surveillance video It's VICTOR PADICHE. Sykes and Watters enter FRAME. Padic stands, greeting them, smiling-cigarette-stained-dentures
Girls, wonderful, here, sit.
Watters scoots in right next to Sykes, gets comfy. Sykes seems a put off by the proximity, ignores it for the mome

Shar...Fourteen, I'm pinched-- I need some heavy shit, fire-from- heaven...my count.

Watters, re-targeting, bringing the Barrett .50 to bear o the lower floors, sighting down from the top, counting ba to fourteen, settling, locking off the tripod, gazing thr her scope... HEARTBEAT BUILDING STILL, becoming more erra WATTERS POV: Fourteenth floor, big glass windows, drawn curtains...she nuzzles the eyepiece, finger slipping delicately inside the trigger guard...waiting.
Bet.
With Sykes attention diverted, Acosta begins slowly movin his hand toward his pant leg, reaching for a hidden ankle holster as we--

--Mustache and his men, hands going to their rigs, should and waist. A handcuffed Ivy watches with them as the elev doors open and a big plume of black smoke vacates the car eerily cast light burns blood red within, infernal, helli Now, another pull engine leaps to life from inside the ca this one gnarled and guttural, winding out...a chainsaw. HEARTBEAT JACKHAMMERING NOW. Out of control. The sound falls away, leaving only the runaway throb of t beating heart as we--
Buddy Israel. Both hands going to his heart. Something horribly wrong. He pitches forward, falling away from Soo pistol-- THE HEARTBEAT crescendos wildly, out-of-control...
...A BELL-RANGER HELICOPTER, the heartbeat becoming the t of rotor blades as it lifts off with Deputy Director Lock and an FBI tactical team inside...

...a kaleidoscope of scenarios about to be played out at exact same second...shared fates...Shakespearean fraught. this soundless realm the CAMERA TAKES US PAST THE FOLLOWI HUGO -- Looking on in horror as Israel collapses. DOC GILL -- Rushing to Buddy's aide. SOOT -- Bringing the 9mm up, leveling it on Hugo.

head_text.subj: CAMERA MOVES OUT INTO THE PENTHOUSE HALLWAY PAST

text: MUSTACHE -- Sensing grave danger, his gun being drawn. Hi m en following suit. IVY -- Pulling away from his captors, looking for cover. DARWIN TREMOR -- Stepping from the elevator, strapped wit a sawed-off pump shotgun in one hand, a vintage elephant gu in the other, looking for lives to end. s LESTER TREMOR -- Chainsaw snarling, spewing oil, psycho s preading viral across a pockmarked face. JEEVES TREMOR -- Sledgehammer in a scabbard on his back, h olding WWII era German "Potato-Masher" grenades, gripped like drumsticks, pins pulled. He hurls them.

head_text.subj: CAMERA MOVES PAST THEM, DOWN ELEVATOR SHAFT TO

text: SYKES -- Pulling extra clips from her handbag, securing t under her garter belt, dumping her heels in favor of hose ACOSTA -- Pant leg lifted, moving panther-quiet, tortoise slow, unfastening the snap on his ankle-holster. c CARRUTHERS -- Near death, eyes locked on Acosta, his mort ombatant, trying desperately to reach his own ankle holst MESSNER -- Watching as his team moves into place around t e levator. Checking his own piece, flicking off the safety.

head_text.subj: CAMERA MOVES OUT THE WINDOW AND UP TO

text: WATTERS -- In the Hotel window across the way, sniper-rif s nug to her shoulder, eye on the scope, waiting for the wo

head_text.subj: CAMERA MOVES THROUGH RIFLE SCOPE UP TO AND INSIDE EARPIEC

text: Inside the earpiece at 10000x normal magnification; micro sound condensers and circuits the size of skyscrapers. Th a voice makes the landscape tremble, like the trump of Go
Bring it.
Back out of the earpiece, down through the scope, over th barrel of the rifle...BOOM...A .50 caliber bullet is birt
The fourteenth floor window of the Nomad detonates with concussive ferocity-- creating a hailstorm of shattered g that sweeps the length of the hallway, engulfing cops and feds whole.

Another round tears in after it, exploding a gilded ceili stanchion, sparking off the rebar, tripping the sprinkler system, dousing the corridor-- everybody runs for cover. One of the AGENTS, wounded, summons another elevator. Messner, undeterred, advances on the elevator containing Sykes and Carruthers.
Sykes, Glock ready to rock, about to move. Acosta, pullin a pistol from his ankle-rig, preparing to backshoot Sykes

head_text.subj: CAMERA ASCENDS BACK UP THROUGH SHAFT

text: Chaos. Carnage. Full blown bloodbath. Heavily-armed men o an overkill override. Mustache and Co., waging close quar warfare with the Brothers Tremor. Bullets blaze, bodies drop, everything burns--

Soot, shooting Hugo several times-- Hugo falling back, confused by the abrupt pain, baffled by the appearance of blood. Gill, overtop of Israel, trying to force feed him nitro-glycerin tablets. Buddy goes into full cardiac arre Disparate sounds collide now, swell to a great tumult-- a incomprehensible crescendo of explosions and chainsaws an gunshots and screams as we--
...nothing...complete and utter silence...
Primo Sparazza...sitting in that hospital bed...waiting.
The Swede...sitting on a sofa in his suite with Sparazza' men...waiting.
Rupert Reed...drunk and despondent...by the phone...waiti
Victor Padiche...hand-wringing...watching his phone...wai
All of it happening at lightspeed. Watters, reloading, watching as leaden contrails of gunsmoke pour from the pulverized fourteenth floor. She resumes her assault.

Messner, a few feet from the car containing Sykes. More sniper fire rakes the hallway. Another elevator arrives, opens...call girls inside. They snuck up somehow, past security... The gunplay gets them spooked, scared-- they scramble from the car-- cops and feds try to stuff them b inside the elevator as rounds continue to rain down. One of the girls catches a hard ricochet, wig leaping off her head as a bounced bullet punches through her skull-- crumbles, instant casualty. Messner hardly notices, movin instead toward the other elevator car.
THIS IS THE FBI! THROW YOUR WEAPON OUT! SHOW ME YOUR HANDS!
(whispering into IFB) Are these feds fake or for real girl!
Carruthers, pawing feebly at her, moaning-- trying to war her-- she shrugs him off.
(yelling) I DON'T KNOW!
Jus' keep doin' y'damage girl, keep these mafuckas off my as--
BANG-- Sykes squeals, spins back, feels numbness spread o her legs and lower trunk, knows she's been shot.
(panic, into her IFB) We're out girl! I'm shot! I'M SHOT!--

ACOSTA fires again, bullet ripping through her studded bustier, gouging kevlar, nicking ribcage-- embedding into the IFB receiver on her hip, ruining it. Sykes falters-- tries to raise her gun-- Acosta raises his aim to her head, about to deliver the c de grace-- Messner appears now, sees Acosta, sights him w

Acosta's chest explodes, he slumps, the gun sliding away- Messner swings wide on the car to reveal: Carruthers, smoking gun, trembling aim, exposed ankle holster...empty. Sykes, kevlar burning, smashed round sti hot, she tries to pull her vest off, finds her newly para arm uncooperative. Messner, advancing now, keeping an eye on his partner as he moves toward the car.
LADY, SHOW ME YOUR HANDS RIGHT NOW!
I NEED MY HANDS MOTHERFUCKER! I'M HIT! KILL ME OR LET ME BE!
Messner enters the elevator, rushes to the doomed Carruth
How bad?
Mortal.
No.
Yeah.

Messner takes his partner under the arms, lugging him int the open hallway, stripping off his shirt. Carruthers sev hand nearly falls away from the rest of his arm. Acosta spits blood from the lungs-- his breathing now a b of pinched snorts and gurgles.
(re: Acosta, yelling to the others) SECURE THIS SUSPECT!
TWO FEDS enter to remove Acosta from the car-- he lets ou guttural yelp as they hoist him-- real pain or playing po

impossible to tell...As his legs clear the elevator doors they slowly close on the wounded Sykes. Messner, tries to prevent them from closing, can't-- gaze up at the digital counter as the elevator continues its a to the Penthouse level...
Sykes, riding up, wounded, vulnerable, trying to reach th control panel to stop the car. She keys her now useless I
(into IFB) Girl, I'm inside, I'm on my way up-- this elevator is going to the Penthouse-- can you hear me--? Baby, can you hear me--
--Watters, panicked, pulling the Barrett up off its tri-p hitting the hallway, double-timing to the stairwell...She has no idea that she's lost radio contact with Watters.
Sit tight if you can hear me Girl! I can't do shit for you from here. I'm moving down for a sightline!

Plaster and debris everywhere, sprinklers tripped, most o Mustache's team shot, shredded or burnt to a crisp. Piece of building and bodies either waterlogged or fully ablaze Mustache and Darwin play duck and cover, exchanging fire. Jeeves, out of grenades, sledgehammer swinging, crushing wall studs, scattering remaining security team members. Ivy, sheltered, having survived the opening salvos, gets ahold of a gun from a chainsaw-shorn former security memb Lester sees Ivy arming himself, blitzes him-- chainsaw snarling, revved out, sending fantails of gristle and chi bone everywhere. Less than fifteen feet separate them. Ivy fires, shots deflected off the blade's teeth, seconds from getting gutted-- he adjusts his aim high, emptying t gun into Lester's chest, bullets blazing haywire, blowing out between Lester's shoulders, stopping a hard charge co

Lester, lopsided, bullet-dazed, drools blood...then dies. Ivy dumps his clip, searches for another-- the chainsaw f stalls. Jeeves, hefting the sledgehammer like a hayseed John Henr looks over as his older brother's life come to an end. He reacts badly.
LESTERRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!

Jeeves buries the sledge in a wall, takes up the chainsaw rips the pullcord, resumes the charge-- Ivy, finds a clip, slams it in the stock, points, pulls-- trigger-stick, hammer-jam. He falls to his back, scurryin away, trouble finding traction, soles slipping-- he keeps pulling the trigger. Jeeves straddles him from above, rai the saw like a great wooden stake, about to bring it down

Ivy's automatic discharges. The round splits the saw's ga tank, spritzing fuel, dousing Jeeves-- A beat before the tank suddenly arcs, exploding, lighting Jeeves up like a four-hundred pound bonfire, bouncing him off the walls; a human Hindenberg, fully engulfed. He flails, burns, howls falls...molten fat melts off his body like lard butter... Darwin, dismayed, both brothers down...He moves on Mustac dispatches him with detached efficiency, snapping his nec clean. He then starts toward Ivy, who's trying desperatel to crawl out of there.

Hugo, crawling across the floor, knees dragging over his blood trail, trying to reach: Israel, on the ground, dyin Soot's gun has jammed. He clears it efficiently, patientl reloading the weapon as Doc Gill, in panic mode, performs full chest compressions on Buddy as we--

Messner, doing the same to Carruthers, trying to restart heart. Acosta, lays there silently, slowly bleeding out, being tended to by a team of agents. In the b.g. Cops and Feds gather near the window, searching for the assailant, binoculars and rifle scopes strafing the Horizon hotel ac the way, concentrating at the open window near the top fl
WATTERS, running up the hallway, past alarmed maid servic and hotel staff. She reaches the lower floor window and raises the scope to her eye, searching for Sykes--
Girl, where are you-- talk to me...how bad are you hit...
She sees the Feds and Cops in the Nomad window across the way. Smoke clears, her field of vision through the scope expands, sharpens.
Georgia goddamn baby, please talk to me, please say somethin' so--
--And that's when she spots the call girl, face obscured, lying dead from a headshot in the hallway...her heart sinks...and she assumes the worst: Sykes is dead.
MOTHERFUCKERS!!

She flicks to full-auto and opens fire right through the glass in front of her-- big gas-ejected shells pop from t breach like bowling pins-- the gathered throng across the way in the Nomad window seem to vaporize in a violent col of heat, blood and building chunks-- Watters bucks big so blasting away with the Barrett...
M'SORRY BABY! I'M SO SORRY! I LOVED YOU SO MUCH!

Sykes, standing now, knock-kneed, kevlar discarded, down a black bra and mini-skirt, blood dribbling over her midr deep indentation near her sternum-- big yellow bruise in bloom-- the bullet didn't penetrate...her elevator arrive at the penthouse level and as the doors open we--

Darwin, looming over Ivy, about to bring the sledge down squarely on his skull-- the elevator doors open in his periphery... He looks over, sees Sykes standing there, ba clothed, wet with blood, gun in her hand...and grins.

Sykes, seeing Darwin standing over Ivy, holding a sledgeh recognizes him as the perv from earlier. She levels the G stepping out of the elevator, steadying herself against t wall, steadying her aim on Darwin's head.
Drop that hammer... (beat, cocking gun) And I drop this one. (beat) Know a killer motherfucker...know they voice. Know they feel...and know you 'bout to die by one.
Then, the sound of an helicopter intrudes, rotor thrum, building steadily, growing louder-- the floor seems to sh as the chopper approaches-- nervous eyes dart-- nobody mo

The chopper draws closer, growing louder-- Hugo, still tr to crawl toward his downed boss. Soot finishes him off wi a flush headshot. Gill, frantic, rapid chest compressions on Israel, who gags, starts, coughs, heart back up and beating. His watery gaze moves from Gill to Soot, who kno stands overtop of him, aiming the 9mm down at him. Israel averts his eyes...the end has come. He looks over and sees his lamb-skin coat, lying there, soaking in Bean blood, ruined beyond recognition. A tear escapes his eye.
...forgive me...
Soot puts the gun flush with Buddy's skull when suddenly, the ceiling begins to tremble and shake...the sound of a helicopter filling the air.

Messner is losing Carruthers, can't revive him, begins to crack-- hammering on his chest...it's no use. He's dead. He sobs-- something slides from his pocket. He glances do ...sees that the bag containing Elmore's severed fingers fallen from his pocket. Doesn't remember hanging onto the He replaces them in his pocket. Looks down at his dead friend, sees his severed hand, also missing fingers... ...the absurdity of this makes Messner want to cry laughi ...and that's when he hears the chopper...and sees it as rises up past their floor, past the contingent of Cops an Feds slugging it out with Watters across the street.

Watters, ears ringing with gunfire reverb, reloading-- sa of return fire ripping back at her-- then, all at once, t shooting stops-- She pauses, thinks it's a ploy-- then sl peers over the window sill as the Bell-Ranger comes into view, over the Nomad, touching down on its narrow rooftop

The doors to the Penthouse level are bashed open and the windows implode as FBI tactical agents repel in, weapons drawn, swarming, surrounding the scene, shouting commands Darwin Tremor drops the sledge, jackrabbits for the eleva diving in as the doors close-- Sykes, stumbling toward Ivy. He sees she's injured, scoop her up like a new bride-- she places something in his hand...Acosta's fake FBI credentials. Ivy looks, nods, ge it-- agents approach, combat crouches, MP-5's at arms.
Let me see your hands!
Ivy, flashing the I.D., taking care to cover the photo.
This woman's been shot, I need to get her medical attention immediately!
Commotion and confusion swirl. The Agent, unsure, searchi for some confirmation-- can't find it, dismisses them and rushes into the Penthouse. Sykes and Ivy slip out the exi

Soot, disarmed, handcuffed. Israel, propped up, sweating badly, seizures still hobbling his heart. Gill, being pat down by the Agents, prescription pills confiscated. Soot held at gunpoint and flex-cuffed, the remainder of rubber appliance pulled off his face. The agents begin to initiate an "All Clear" over their ra Moments pass before Deputy Director Locke enters the room He approaches Soot, studies him, to one of the agents;
Soot?
The Agent nods confirmation. Locke reaches into Soot's co finds his cellphone...hits redial.
(into phone) Would you join us please...
Locke disconnects, passes the phone to an underling.
Where are Carruthers and Messner?
Agent Carruthers was killed sir, (as Locke turns back) Agent Messner is unaccounted for.
Account for him.
Messner, bounding up the steps, gun drawn, hears voices c down the stairs toward him-- stops, checks his weapon...
Ivy and Sykes descending the stairs. He carries her like princess, sweeping her down landing after landing.
What's your name baby girl...
Sykes, somehow shy, sweet, gazing up at him.
...Georgia.
Ivy, big smile.
Georgia on my mind wit'yo fine ass. You know you saved this black man.
You know I did baby... (smiling, assessing) And a deep, dark one at that. Now if you ain't a dog, which you don't look like--
--never in a million girl--
--good, then all you got to be is grateful.
No doubt. That's my moms there, taught me them skills.
SYKES
You love her? SIR IVY
My mamma? C'mon shorty, y'gotta ask? (beat, sees her wounds) You hurtin' pretty bad? SYKES
(nodding) Got hit twice. SIR IVY
It's going around ain't it? Mafuckas catching bullets like the common cold up in this bitch. (beat) I think I accidentally shot and killed my boy today. SYKES
Well, if it's any comfort, I's goin' in to there to act a fool baby. (taps her gun) Straight rockin' heat and slayin' niggas-- SIR IVY
For real? SYKES
Mmm-hmm...and your boy very well mighta been one of 'em. SIR IVY
True? SYKES
Like a mafucka. SIR IVY
That takes some of the sting out. SYKES
I probably woulda busted on you too ...and what a shame that woulda been. SIR IVY
I feel like I know you girl. I feel like I've known you forever. (beat, smiles) You gonna lemme see your scars? SYKES
You do the right thing. Sit with me while I heal, let it develop slow.
What were you doin' here anyway?
'Spose to kill this fool named Buddy Israel.
This gets Ivy's biggest grin.
Damn baby girl, you makin' a nigga fall hard now.
He reaches the seventeenth floor, rounds the corner, near runs into Messner, has a gun thrust in his face.
F.B.I. YOU'RE UNDER ARREST! PUT HER DOWN, GET UP AGAINST THAT WALL!
Sykes recognizes him and in a blink has a gun under his c

Don't play out this string, 'cuz it's real short I didn't do your man downstairs. I found him that way. Now whether or not you believe that ain't the least bit important. We either goin' work this out and live, or stay doin' the shit we been doin' and die. Now I got no beef with you, or wit ya'll bureau...so you better off jus' movin' on & lettin' us be.
Messner, eyes moving from Ivy to Sykes. Stalemate, no sen pushing. He moves past them, hits the stairwell exit on eighteen. Ivy and Sykes resume their trek down the stairs
Messner, bashing in from the stairwell. WHIP PAN OVER TO REVEAL: The Swede, still accompanied by the Sparazza goon arriving in the elevator at the same time.

Darwin, on his way down, rolling around on the floor of t car, covering himself in congealed blood and bullet casin slicking back his hair, losing the security jacket, splas yet more blood on himself. Satisfied, he snatches Carruth F.B.I. credentials up off the floor...and waits.

The elevator arrives at the far end. A small asian man carrying a stack of clean towels steps off and starts dow the hall-- sees Watters, sees the .45 trained on him-- do an abrupt about face and disappears back inside the car. Watters lowers the gun, wipes tears, the area around her littered with spent .50 caliber shells. The fourteenth fl of the Nomad is now empty. Sirens wail in the distance. Down below, Watters can see a bevy of law enforcement personnel streaming toward the Horizon. She slowly takes the Barrett off the ledge, begins breaking it down, glanc up at the Penthouse of the Nomad as we...
Director Locke waits. Messner and The Swede appear in the doorway. The Swede nods to all concerned and starts towar Israel. Doc Gill acknowledges the Swede.
Dr. Ingstrom, he's had a mild cardiac episode and recurring arrhythmia, I've given him 60cc's of Nobuneatol...
The Swede kneels down next to Israel, dropping his black valise, cracking it open. Messner, dazed, dumbfounded, se Locke.
...Deputy Director Locke?
Locke approaches, lays a comforting arm on Messner, guidi him to a chair.
Here. Sit.   Please.
(pointing to Swede) This is him? The hitman hired to kill Israel? He's a doctor?
Difficult to explain everything now... (beat, toward Israel) And much larger issues loom. (beat) I'm sorry about Carruthers...Damndest thing to have to die for.
The Swede, working on Israel, shaking his head, something wrong. He stands, crosses to Locke, silently confers.
(to The Swede) Very well. (to other Agents) Take Mr. Israel to the roof, he'll be traveling with us.

Suddenly, Soot breaks from his captors, sprinting for the shattered Penthouse windows, launching himself-- a swan d out into the open air-- He hangs there for a moment, an aesthetically striking form; like Lazarus cast against a cobalt blue sky, backlit by the sun from the lake below-- --till gravity grabs, pulls-- plummeting him toward earth sending him headlong into the vast expanse of concrete be This startlingly event is dismissed by mutual shrugs and collective lack of concern. Messner is absolutely agog.
(to Locke, forceful) What the hell-- What is this!? People died. Agent Carruthers is dead!

We have to transport Mr. Israel to Las Vegas, time is of the essence. The gulfstream is standing by on the jetway at Tahoe International. I'm sorry, I'm restricted from disclosing anymore information. Return to Washington. You'll be debriefed in the coming days.
Locke says no more-- starts out of the Penthouse with the Swede, Dr. Gill and Buddy Israel in tow. A Bureau forensi team arrives to quietly tag and bag the dead...Messner st there, absolutely agog.

Hives of activity. Cordons and crime scene lockdowns like onion layers, multiple law enforcement agencies, confound confused-- too many cooks, too many kitchens. Nobody know who the hells in charge. Local paramedics and EMT's cart out the wounded. Coroners and M.E.'s cart out the dead. Reporters and national news outlets crowd police barricad outside, competing for coverage, as--
Acosta is wheeled through the lobby, hooked up to IV and oxygen, looking ghastly, like something exhumed. He catch the eye of the pimply casino employee and manages a wink.

He's flex-cuffed to the gurney and pushed against the wal for the moment as the Agents move off to deal with the re appearance of Lazlo Soot-- whose body has been unceremoni splattered over the parking lot. As the Agents depart, Acosta peers down at his shackles; simple plastic binding rods-- he smiles...a moment later stiletto blade fires from his sleeve as--

Darwin Tremor staggering out of an open elevator, blood- sodden, head down-- FBI badge held aloft for all its wort Playing it up, free pass, Agents rush in, hold him uprigh help him toward a line of awaiting ambulances outside as-

Ivy and Sykes, being released from the stairwell, cut cha sliding off-- Ivy holds up pilfered FBI creds. Rampant confusion makes the moment possible. He's waved through, carrying Sykes, looking every bit the good Samaritan. Sykes, a mess of mascara, adorned in her unmentionables, looking every bit the prostitute she appears to be-- she spots the woman at the counter from earlier. The woman ga back, jaw agape. Sykes can only shrug...if you can't beat 'em-- join 'em. She and Ivy cross the lobby as--

Messner...morose, exiting another elevator with the sheet draped body of Carruthers on a gurney. Gandersen, the Nom owner, spots him, starts over, looks to unleash, gets clo enough to catch Messner's expression. Sees it in his eyes...enough dead bodies for one day. Messner continues moving through the lobby, hears the chopper taking off as
Through the clear glass atrium of the Nomad, the Bell-Ran goes airborne against an impossibly clear winter sky, ban south toward Las Vegas.
The Horizon hotel across the way: The Fourteenth floor wi

Watters, gear stowed, seemingly indifferent about the lev of law enforcement heading up her way, about to launch an Alamo-like last stand in honor of her fallen sista. She hears commotion erupt from outside as survivors begin filing from the building. She takes up the Barrett, gazin through the scope, looking, looking, looking...stops...ho shit...it's her. It's Sykes.

And she's alive and being carried by a man, a big gorgeou black man that she's gazing upon with utter love and long A boulder-sized lump takes shape in Watters throat; betra backbit-- tears come to fast to contain, too many to cont Numbed...the sensation leaving her fingers, she finds her racking the bolt on the Barrett and gazing through crosshairs...taking aim on Ivy's head. Behind her, the elevator arrives, an a dozen armed cops, hoo-rah from it, hustling the length of the hall, descending down on her--
(whispering) ...I loved you baby...

A gunshot in the distance followed by shrieks-- Darwin Tr snaps his head around at the sound, moving past platoons Cops and Feds now rushing that way. His I.D. is out, affording him easy egress. He hops the stairs up, top lev Barracuda parked at the rear of the lot. As he approaches
Hey...

Darwin glances over at...Hollis Elmore, standing there, s horribly discolored, disease afflicted. He wears a hooded tourist sweatsuit; "Ta-Hoe, Ta-Hoe It's Off To Fun We Go! stitched in cursive across the front. He's holding the Co Python against his hip.
(nodding to Cuda) That your car?
Darwin, a beat, what-to-do...hillbilly-acumen in overdriv
No, I'm confiscating it. (holding up badge) F.B.I.
Now Elmore raises the Colt with his good hand, advancing Darwin, moving gingerly, his legs not quite there...
You're F.B.I.?
Darwin tries to stay tight, composed.
That's right...and I'd advise y'ta lower your weapon sir.
Elmore keeps coming.
You investigating those murders out at the lake?
(blanching a bit) Ww...uh...

Three men were ambushed and shot, two died and had their bodies tossed into the lake, the other has severe hypothermia, possible dementia and will probably be a multiple amputee by week's end...if he even lives that long.
Darwin, uh-oh...
No, I ain't even heard abou--
--Oops.

(even more menace) You "ain't"-- (beat, teeth clenched) You have any idea how close to death I've been? You understand that I'm dying now? That I've survived bullets and frostbite and raging fever-- (holding up hand) missing fingers and every fucking imaginable horror in between?
Darwin...speechless...he's done.
And I'm asking you now, "Is that your car" and you can't even come clean and do me the decency of a straight answer, with the fucking state that I'm in!?
Elmore, that Colt looking like a cannon this close to Dar
Yeah, shit-- hell, you're right. I'm sorry.
You shot me and murdered my friends.
I did. We-- yeah, I know.
And threw us into the lake.
Pretty much, yep.
Elmore, still nodding.
And this is your car, isn't it?
Mmm-hmm.
But there were more of you?
Yeah, m'brothers...They didn't make it.
Two of 'em?
(nods, tears flow) Thass' right. (beat, wiping eyes) I got other brother's though, so it ain't so bad.
You were here huntin' a man named Israel, weren't you? Your name is Tremor.
Darwin gazes up at Elmore, some fraternal bond forms.
I was. It is...That who you was here for? Israel?
A pause. Elmore nods.
Well...we both got beat out then, didn't we?
Darwin, slowly lowering the Colt.
Yes we did... (long pause, then) Now, give me your car keys. And get the fuck out of here.
Darwin, sifting through his pockets, tossing Elmore the k
S'fair...lemme just grab somethin'.
Elmore brings the Colt back up.   Darwin, hands up, hold
No, no, no, I'm done with all that.
He reaches in, pulls a joint off the dashboard, forages, finds matches, lights up, starts off.

(to 'Cuda) Probably needs to be tuned. Air filter's old. Plugs might be bad. Heater and AC ain't worked in forever. (seeing Elmore waver) There's some good drugs in the glove box there, homespun, keep you smiling, semi-lucid at leas'... (beat, puffing away) Well, God's speed t'ya then. Sorry 'bout all that. S'way a'the world though, winners and losers y'know. S'way it's always goin' be...
Darwin, walking away, taking huge hits off that joint, traipsing down the steps, getting stoned out of his mind. Elmore, considering, re-considering, looking at that Colt
...Oh, fuck that...

--As he back shoots Darwin with all six rounds from the Python, blowing holes through him. Darwin goes lop-sided, legs failing, lit-joint still smoking in his mouth as die standing, only to fall like cut timber seconds later. Elmore acts quickly, sliding into the 'Cuda and starting that big block Hemi roaring to life under the hood.

Pedestrians and passerbys drawn to the commotion at the N the bottleneck bogs traffic down, making it impossible to move. Elmore crouches low as police and emergency personn cross in front of the car... Slowly, the crosswalk begins thin and then finally clear...save a single man: Messner...standing right in front of the Barracuda, stari at the tires, staring at Elmore. The two lock eyes as he moves around to the driver's side, reaching into his pock --Elmore lifts the Colt up off his lap, putting his heavi bandaged hand on the wheel. Then he sees Messner's FBI cr clipped to his belt-- can't tell if this one's legit.

He sets the Colt down on the floorboard as Messner walks pulling a plastic bag from his pocket: The one containing three severed fingers. He glances down at Elmore's mummif left hand, holding out the bag for him to take. Elmore, unsure, accepting the bag, seeing what's inside, embarrassed by it-- he sets it down on the seat next to h
Your friends were taken to Carson City Memorial, they're going to be autopsied and shipped back for burial.
I'll take care of it.
Messner, nodding. A beat.
